snippet: "The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey" had been expected by some analysts to repeat for a fourth week as the most popular movie in North American theaters.
abstract: "The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey" had been expected by some analysts to repeat for a fourth week as the most popular movie in North American theaters.

headline.main: 'Texas Chainsaw 3D' Leads at the Box Office
headline.print_headline: ‘Texas Chainsaw 3D’ Leads at the Box Office
